channel.title: OMG! It wont let me compile this message come's up..please help me
channel.description:
"The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannt find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . ."
can someone help me please!
also its not my java i have the latest version.. :D

item.title: OMG! It wont let me compile this message come's up..please help me
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

This is what I have and it works for most people I have helped:

@echo off title YOURSERVER Compiler "C:\program files\java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Change the 8 to what java you are using.

Read full topic
item.source: OMG! It wont let me compile this message come's up..please help me

item.title: OMG! It wont let me compile this message come's up..please help me
item.dc:creator: @ChillScape ChillScape!
item.description:
@ChillScape wrote:

noob thats what he has in his compiler -,- here edit you compiler take everythng out fo there and put this in to it…

@ECHO off color 4a javac *.java pause

item.title: OMG! It wont let me compile this message come's up..please help me
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

[quote=“P 0 X 0, post:1, topic:18308”]“The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannt find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .”

can someone help me please!

also its not my java i have the latest version… :D[/quote]
paste this in your compiler:

@echo off color 4B title "yourservername" Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_07in/java.exe" server pause
if that doesnt work then i have no idea :P[br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 12:14:14 AM[/size][hr]oh and change the 7 to the version of java you have

Read full topic
